module.header:
<style>

.bstrap30 .table>tbody>tr.active>td, .bstrap30 .table>tbody>tr.active>th, .bstrap30 .table>tbody>tr>td.active, .bstrap30 .table>tbody>tr>th.active, .bstrap30 .table>tfoot>tr.active>td, .bstrap30 .table>tfoot>tr.active>th, .bstrap30 .table>tfoot>tr>td.active, .bstrap30 .table>tfoot>tr>th.active, .bstrap30 .table>thead>tr.active>td, .bstrap30 .table>thead>tr.active>th, .bstrap30 .table>thead>tr>td.active, .bstrap30 .table>thead>tr>th.active {
    background-color: #ffffff;
}

div.angrid .table>thead>tr>th {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff !important;
}

div.angrid .angrid-search {
    padding: 25px 0 20px 0;
}



.bstrap30 .table>tbody>tr>td {
    border-top: 1px solid #fff;
}

.bstrap30 .table-striped>tbody>tr:nth-of-type(odd) {
    background-color: #fff;
}

 .bubbleBor {
    width: 350px;
     padding: 2px 2px;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    background: #0026E1;
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    // border-radius: 10px;
   position: relative;
   letter-spacing: .03em;
   font-family: Helvetica;
   margin-left: 20px;
  }

 .bubbleLO {
    width: 350px;
     padding: 2px 2px;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    background: #00D2FF;
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    // border-radius: 10px;
   position: relative;
   letter-spacing: .03em;
   font-family: Helvetica;
   margin-left: 20px;
  }

    .bubble-arrowLO {
      position: absolute;
      width: 0;
      bottom: 22px;
      left: -12px;
      height: 0;
    }

    .bubble-arrowLO:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      border: 0 solid transparent;
      border-top: 9px solid #00D2FF;
      border-radius: 0 20px 0;
      width: 12px;
      height: 26px;
      transform: rotate(139deg);
    }

 .bubbleAgent {
    width: 350px;
     padding: 2px 2px;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    background: #BA0EF6;
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    // border-radius: 10px;
   position: relative;
   letter-spacing: .03em;
   font-family: Helvetica;
   margin-left: 20px;
  }

    .bubble-arrowAgent {
      position: absolute;
      width: 0;
      bottom: 22px;
      left: -12px;
      height: 0;
    }

    .bubble-arrowAgent:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      border: 0 solid transparent;
      border-top: 9px solid #BA0EF6;
      border-radius: 0 20px 0;
      width: 12px;
      height: 26px;
      transform: rotate(139deg);
    }

   .name {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        margin: 4px 0 5px 0;
        color: #fff;
      }

  .messageBor {
        font-size: 12px;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 18px;
        color: #fff;
        padding-left: 10px;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
      }

.timestampBor{
        font-size: 11px;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 2px;
        right: 10px;
        color: #e6e6e6;
      }

.timestampLO{
        font-size: 11px;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 2px;
        right: 10px;
        color: #fbfbfb;
      }

    .bubble-arrow {
      position: absolute;
      width: 0;
      bottom: 22px;
      left: -12px;
      height: 0;
    }

    .bubble-arrow:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      border: 0 solid transparent;
      border-top: 9px solid #0026E1;
      border-radius: 0 20px 0;
      width: 12px;
      height: 26px;
      transform: rotate(139deg);
    }

 .bubbleEnc {
    width: 350px;
    padding: 2px 2px;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    background: #E7E7E7;
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
   // border-radius: 10px;
    position: relative;
   letter-spacing: .03em;
   font-family: Helvetica;
   float: right;
   margin-right: 20px;

  }
    .txtEnc {
      padding: 0px 25px 8px 15px;
      letter-spacing: .05em;
}

    .txt {
      padding: 8px 25px 8px 15px;
      letter-spacing: .05em;
}

   .nameEnc {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        margin: 4px 0 10px 0;
        color: #000;
        position: absolute;
        right: 10px;
      }

   .nameEncLeft {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #000;        
      }

   .nameEncLeftBor {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #0026E1;        
      }

   .nameEncLeftAgent {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #BA0EF6;        
      }

   .nameEncLeftLO {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #00D2FF;        
      }


  .messageEnc {
        font-size: 12px;
        padding-left: 10px;
        line-height: 18px;
        color: #000;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
      }

      .timestampEnc{
        font-size: 11px;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 2px;
        right: 10px;
        color: #6d6d6d;
      }

    .bubble-arrowEnc {
      position: absolute;
      width: 0;
      bottom:40px;
      left: -16px;
      height: 0;
       right: -2px;      
        bottom: 25px;
        left: auto;
    }

    .bubble-arrowEnc:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      border: 0 solid transparent;
      border-top: 9px solid #E7E7E7;
      border-radius: 0 20px 0;
      width: 12px;
      height: 28px;
      transform: rotate(30deg) scaleY(-1);
    }

.checkMark {
     color: green;
     float: right;
}

.redX {
     color: red;
     float: right;
}



</style>
module.title: Text Messages Grid
